content: I think I'll try out Scribd since it seems like it has a wide selection of titles and a flat monthly fee. I've been meaning to read more, and this way I can listen to audiobooks during my commute. Speaking of commute, I've been trying to get more steps in by getting off the bus a stop earlier and walking the remaining 10-15 minutes to the office. Do you have any tips on how to stay motivated to keep up with this habit?
